content: If you are just getting started with web development, or maybe you are striving to implement your leanings to build a real-world application. Then you are in the right place.

Aspiring developers often encounter difficulties while learning the subject of web development. It took me a while to realize I was learning the wrong way. I “learned and re-learned” without really knowing how to implement the knowledge to complete a real-world project. This hole is so deep that I wouldn’t want you to fall into it.

In this blog, I share with you all that works for me. My journey as a developer, the exclusive tips, the concise and actionable guides that will help you learn the subject in a much quicker way. No technical jargon. Just beginner-friendly articles.
